tasks.label: cmake debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=arm-gcc-toolchain.cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G Ninja ..

tasks.label: cmake release
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=arm-gcc-toolchain.cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -G Ninja ..
